CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("https://"&IF( CONTAINS(QB_QBO_Org_Name__c , "Sandbox Company"), "sandbox." ,"") &"qbo.intuit.com/app/"& IF( QB_Type__c=="Vendor","vendordetail", "customerdetail")&"?nameId="+ RIGHT( QB_External_Id__c ,(LEN(QB_External_Id__c )-FIND('-', QB_External_Id__c ))) ,QB_Display_Name__c , "_blank")
CustomField.label: See this Customer in QuickBooks
